website_summaries.verdict: Top-of-the-line wireless noise cancelling headphones providing 5-Star sound quality sound.
pros: Loved by gym-goers as well as gamers
Once you get used to the hands-free headphones, you may never go back
Customers report this pair can last for several years
cons: Because these headphones are wireless they may require frequent charging

website_summaries.verdict: The pricey AKG N700NC M2 Wireless headphones offer solid noise cancellation, but their audio performance is the real selling point.
pros: Can be used in wired or passive modes

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. Sound quality is fantastic. The app for eq is great. Some people complain they fit small, i think i have a pretty large head and i have no problem wearing them for 6 - 7 hours a day at my desk at work. I do wish you could turn the ANC off, but not that big of a deal. I dont feel the "pressure" i feel from other ANC headphones, so i dont feel like they fatigue my ears like other ANC headphones have. If you can get these at the right price I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JDA45

customer_reviews.title: High price but very good headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever owned. Excellent range, wonderful sound quality and pretty comfortable. I own a couple Bose headphones and these blow them away. I got these as a package deal when I bought a new Samsung phone so I'm not sure about the price, but they are exceptional headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really wish to keep it but could not cuz uncomfortable wearing
customer_reviews.text: Generally, not much to comment about since it is a all-round product which does well (even though not the best) in almost every aspect of a wireless ANC headphone (Sound quality, Connectivity, Ease of Control). Personally recommend NC700 if it does not cause pain to the part of head above your ears and upper ears and especially so if you have a Samsung Phone that supports its Scalable Codec.
customer_reviews.author: YU FU

customer_reviews.title: Must try.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the noise cancellation worked better but the sound quality is great like this headset allot.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headset.
customer_reviews.text: We received these with a S10 plus. They sound great, easy to connect to TV, and my kindle. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: SteveGord

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. A little tight, but I have a big head so...
customer_reviews.author: Craig Green

customer_reviews.title: Recieved item that would not power on?
customer_reviews.text: Reviewed these for awhile, ordered a pair and attempted to charge them before first time use. They would not power on and I noticed they would only charge for a few seconds then turn off? They would work with the audio cable connected but thats not allowing you to move freely. Returned item...they did look nice though
customer_reviews.author: Michael Figgins

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation is not bad but could be better. Also the mic is too close to the ear and while speaking into it, the other person can not hear you clearly. Other then that, they fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C Turner

customer_reviews.title: A minute of sound disconnectivity
customer_reviews.text: Used it fresh out of the box bundled with my Samsung Galaxy S10+. The noise cancellation is perfect for me but not much for comfortability. I gave 4 star for sound quality because there's a minute of disconnetivity from my device whenever i play music or watch a movie even if the battery is still good at 60%.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with quality of sound and easy pairing over Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Liked, bought as a bundle with my phone. Good quality. Good sound, not a heavy user, satisfying my need.
customer_reviews.author: Ion Matei

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! HEADSET NOT INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give any review. There's nothing to give a review too.. broken seal tape. Warning, headset not included.. it's a $300 box
customer_reviews.author: Roanne Palacio

customer_reviews.title: Akg headphones
customer_reviews.text: The product was at a great price and the quality of the item is outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Esquer

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Crisp clear sound. Limited background noise. Easily fits over my ears
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Headphones do an amazing job. I wear at the gym and they are great for canceling out all the noise. Comes with a travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morganstern

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: For the price they are the best in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are
customer_reviews.text: Phone use and gaming and it works great. Wouldn't pay over 150 for them thought bought them with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bria lee

customer_reviews.title: Includes cord so can be used without Blu tooth connection!
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation could be better but overall very clear crisp sound!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. Solid construction. Fold up nice. Excellent sound quality and noise cancelling. Not exactly loud enough for me but that was easily remedied with an inline amplifier
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Heath

customer_reviews.title: Nearly inaudible
customer_reviews.text: These should've sounded great, but I could barely hear anything. I downloaded the app, which made them sound a wee bit louder--and added distortion, I returned for a name brand, less expensive set that I LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: BiblioBubba

customer_reviews.title: Best at its sound quality and long life battery..
customer_reviews.text: Supr with best sound quality. Long range cover my full 1500sft home area and never breaks down the signals even though there is any interference walls.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Bad Controls
customer_reviews.text: Sound was quite good, but the controls were way too close together for my sausage fingers. Also, the plastic parts felt very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lucian V. Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product and very comfortable on the ear. Sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Faniyah

customer_reviews.title: Good noise canceling headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bass is a little on the soft side but sounds good with out distorting. Overall great headphones. Charge up time is very fast. They do last 16+ hours in a charge I can work 2 full shifts at work. Listening to music, or using them on Microsoft teams for meetings and they keep going. Quality of using them as a chat headset or answering phone is very good.
customer_reviews.author: John Elliott

customer_reviews.title: AKG Did Not Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is AMAZING. They have a neutral sound stage, but I’ve found details in songs I’ve never heard before listening with these. I compared these directly with the Sony WH-1000 and went with these, to give an idea of comparison. 4 out of 5 because Bluetooth connectivity isn’t 5.0 and two devices at once is possible, but the quality becomes terrible. Also, streaming video content can sometime be a tiny bit crackly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael chaides

customer_reviews.title: Better than Sony?
customer_reviews.text: Amazing producto better sound than Sony...more comfortable for long flights. Nothing beats Sony noise cancellation but akg nailed with these
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pablo Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality! At first you might be discouraged (just like I was) because the bass seems to lack, I was considering returning the product because of it. well all you have to do it download the akg headphone app and adjust the eq on your headphones. You can quite literally, completely customize the sound of these headphones. Buy buy buy buy buy!
customer_reviews.author: E-man

customer_reviews.title: The King Of Headsets are here
customer_reviews.text: The best headsets I've ever worn. I wear these in the gym for training 💪 hard like a bodybuilder. I absolutely love these & great paired with my S20 Ultra. Their sound is way better than my Beats pro & my JBL's. 😂They Did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: OUCH
customer_reviews.text: These are very very uncomfortable. On the plus side they do pair with Samsung OLED TV's NOTE: Samsung TV does not allow you to listen to headphones and TV speakers at the same time. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Bo R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike is that you may have to turn the Bluetooth settings off and on twice
customer_reviews.author: alan m. harris

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: You will not be disappointed with these earphones. I use mine at night to listen to podcasts (note: also keeps spiders out of your ears). The sound is great and the noise cancellation superb. I have a number of headphones and some work better than others. When I sleep at night, I always wear my headphones. All I hear is what I am listening to with these. Some of my other noise cancellation headphones don't cancel the noise as much. Others don't have as nice of sound. I like these so far the most.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Ever notice people use amazon as their personal publication site . Take the advice of the short and sweet
customer_reviews.author: Al bundy, shoe man

customer_reviews.title: AKG is BAD
customer_reviews.text: I got Bose, will not settle anything with this brand period, Dont own this BUT have used AKG, Stay-Out
customer_reviews.author: Hazar Nikon  Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite noise cancelling headphones. They offer the right balance of price and quality. Sound is pretty good. Not equal to the very best noise cancelling headphones but just a shade less good. Like that they are foldable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L. Katz

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easily connected via bluetooth to my kindle! Sound is good. Very pleased! My only complaint is that I can't access all the features of these without having an app installed
customer_reviews.author: My Two Cents

product_meta.title: AKG (A Samsung Brand) N700NC M2 Over-Ear Foldable Wireless Headphones, Active Noise Cancelling Headphones - Black (US Version), 2.6, Model:GP-N700HAHCIWA
product_meta.description: Designed with dual-foam cushions for superior comfort, the premium AKG N700NC M2 Wireless noise cancelling headphones deliver authentic, balanced audio precisely as the artist intended. Feel every layer of sound with AKG Signature Sound, while your headphones automatically tune out surrounding distractions with adaptive noise cancelling technology. And, thanks to a long-lasting battery, you can immerse yourself in the exquisite listening experience for up to 23 hours. Impedance: 16 ohm. Battery Type Polymer Li-ion Battery (3.7V, 800 mAh).
feature_bullets: AKG signature sound: when it's mixed and mastered the way it was intended to be heard, music opens your mind to endless possibilities; AKG has devoted decades to delivering a sound experience that ignites creative expression

PREMIUM DESIGN: Flat and foldable, the soft ear cushions with dual memory foam and padded adjustable headband deliver a comfortable and luxurious listening experience; Plus, they're ideal for travel, thanks to an elegant carrying case, an airplane adaptor, a 3; 5mm audio cable and a USB C charging cable all included in the box

Adaptive NOISE cancellation: turn down distracting sounds so it's just you and the music, uninterrupted; Whatever is happening in the room, your headphones will automatically minimize surrounding noise

Ambient aware technology or Talk thru mode: control how much surrounding noise you want to let in with the touch of a button, so you can stay in the world While getting lost in the 1 you're listening to; When you want to have a face to face conversation, Talk thru mode drops The music down so you don't have to remove your headphones
ANDROID & iOS COMPATIBILITY: Your N700NC M2 Wireless headphones pair with both Android and iOS compatible smartphones via Bluetooth connection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars179 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Headphones, 3.5mm Audio Cable, Carrying Case, Quick Start Guide
